extendedInfo.description: A Free app for your Preschool kids! Love Chinese world & their cultural styles? Preschool Chinese Memory Game has a taste of Chinese tradition and life style. Preschoolers will learn while they play.Preschool Chinese Memory Game has Chinese Temples; Cultural dressed up Male & Female. The game has a typical Chinese look which will make it more interesting and colorful.A Memory game increases your learning and improves your time management skills.***FEATURES***â Easy Game play.â Three levels of Difficulty to challenge your memory skills i.e Easy, Medium and Hard.â 5 addictive and amazing game stages.â Tic-Toc timer to challenge the speed at which your kids are playing.â Best flipping animations.â Scores at the end telling you how fast did you complete the level. The faster you complete the rack the more scores you earn.â Animated Splash Screen.â Colorful HD images.â Original tic-toc timer sound.***HOW TO PLAY***â Select the difficulty level from Easy, Medium and Hard.â Tap the play button to get started.â Start tapping the cards until you match them up in pairs.â Complete the matching quickly as the timer keeps on ticking.â Scores are displayed once the level is cleared.â Tap the next button & move to the next level.***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.
